PayloadIdentifier.description: A unique identifier for the payload, dot-delimited.  Usually root PayloadIdentifier+subidentifier

PayloadOrganization.description: This value describes the issuing organization of the profile, as displayed to the user

PayloadType.description: The type of the payload, a reverse dns string

PayloadVersion.description: The version of the whole configuration profile.

flashScreen.description: Flash the screen when an alert sound occurs

mouseDriver.description: Mouse Keys allows the mouse pointer to be controlled using the keyboard number pad.

mouseDriverCursorSize.description: Mouse Cursor Size. 1 is normal, 4 is maximum.

slowKey.description: Slow keys adjusts the amount of time between when a key is pressed and when it is activated

stickyKey.description: Sticky keys allows modifier keys to be set without having to hold the key down.

voiceOverOnOffKey.description:
VoiceOver provides spoken and brailled descriptions of items on the computer screen and provides
                control of the computer through the user of the keyboard.
